citation.article-title: Numerical analysis of rapidly growing scotochromogenic mycobacteria, including Mycobacterium obusense sp. nov., nom. rev., Mycobacterium rhodesiae sp. nov., nom. rev., Mycobacterium aichiense sp. nov., nom. rev., Mycobacterium chubuense sp. nov., nom. rev., and Mycobacterium tokaiense sp. nov., nom. rev.

p.s: Description of Mycobacterium tokaiense (Tsukamura 1973) Tsukamura sp. nov., nom. rev.
This organism was originally isolated from soil from the Tokai District of Japan. The type strain is strain 47503 (previously, strain 5553; =ATCC 27282 =NCTC 10821).
